Giza - Class in shef.mt.tools
This class models the information stored in a giza translation file
In order to minimise the amount of giza information we store in memory, we will only hold in the translations for those words found in the source text
Giza() - Constructor for class shef.mt.tools.Giza
 
Giza(String) - Constructor for class shef.mt.tools.Giza
intialises Giza from a file
Giza2 - Class in shef.mt.tools
This class models the information stored in an alternative giza translation file
In order to minimise the amount of giza information we store in memory, we will only hold in the translations for those words found in the source text
Giza2() - Constructor for class shef.mt.tools.Giza2
 
Giza2(String) - Constructor for class shef.mt.tools.Giza2
 
GizaFilter - Class in shef.mt.util
 
GizaFilter(String, String) - Constructor for class shef.mt.util.GizaFilter
 
GizaMerger - Class in shef.mt.util
Transforms a giza translation file where entries represent indeces in a vocabulary into a file where entries are represented by words
Usage: wlv.mt.util.GizaMerger
The last parameter, , is optional.
GizaMerger() - Constructor for class shef.mt.util.GizaMerger

GlobalProcessor - Interface in shef.mt.tools.mqm
Interface for classes that need to collecte statistcs from all the input corpus before processing sentence by sentence
